MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH4 postcode area of Edinburgh, We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:10am. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the local substation and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes.  We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:44 PM on Monday, 04 January 2021.
